resources.string: This game is targeted for users with vision impairment. \nTalkback feature is not required but is recommended for the full game experience.

%s Instructions: 1: When you start the game, you will have %d seconds to explore the revealed cards. This time can be changed in the settings page. 2: After the given time to explore, all the cards will be turned face down. 3: The board is a four rows and four columns size. 4: You will be able to share your record after finishing the game.
